data.message:
Hi my friend got a problem about his account. His account was got disabled and had submit an appeal and tried to contact facebook via email but there were no reply and still cant recover his account. How can he recover his account back? His willing to provide anything you need to just to recover his account because he's account really meant alot to him and doing some business there.
Thank you! Hoping for his account recovery.

replies.message: Hey Neil. We're sorry to hear that your friend is experiencing this issue. We appreciate his patience as our team reviews his appeal. In the meantime, you may be able to track the status of your report in the Support Dashboard: http://on.fb.me/RvGnjd - Kristen

faithful
 in the name of jesus christ the lord of lord the king of kings of Jews.
 pray with me for Malaysia missing Airplane my God to Give them his Direction 
 praise God

Hey Facebook. He cant track his report because he cant even log in. His account were disabled, he's not doing something bad and not hurting anyone. Please! Tell me what he need to do. His willing to provide everything you need just to recover his account back.
Here's his FACEBOOK URL: https://www.facebook.com/magicarl33
Please! Enabled his account. Thank you! Hoping for his account recovery.
